original: ENGSTRÖMER, Folke, Bankdirektör, Uppsala, f Sollefteå 19/12 82 av bankkamr Th E o Anna Högberg, gm Dory Bexelius. Studex Hsand 01, jur fil ex 02 o jur utr kand Upps 06. Tingstjg i Vnrl 06—08, l :e rådman i Hsand 09—18, ombudsm BkAB N Sverige, sederm AB Sthlm Handelsbk, i Hsand 10—18, exp.sekr o byråch hos JO 18—22, omb.man o bitr dir Uplands Ensk bk 22, dir 29, v. vkst dir sed. 33. Ag fsthg övernäs, Upps.-Näs s :n. Ordf i revis f Upps stad, revisor i Upps Ensk lärov mfl instit, ombud bosättnlå-nef Upps. Suppl centralstyr Upl Ensk bk, Uppsala-Ekeby AB mfl företag. RVO; SHT. Ivrig skidåkare o fjällvandrare, ständ. led. Skidfrämjandet.
translated: ENGSTRÖMER, Folke, Bank Director, Uppsala, born in Sollefteå on December 19, 1882, son of bank employee Th E and Anna Högberg, married to Dory Bexelius. High school graduate in Sandviken in 1901, Bachelor of Law and Philosophy in 1902, and Bachelor of Juridical Science in Uppsala in 1906. Court clerk in Vänersborg from 1906 to 1908, first magistrate in Sandviken from 1909 to 1918, representative of BkAB in North Sweden, later AB Stockholm Handelsbank, in Sandviken from 1910 to 1918, executive secretary and bureau chief at the Ombudsman's Office from 1918 to 1922, representative and deputy director of Uplands Ensk Bank in 1922, director in 1929, and vice managing director since 1933. Owns property Övernäs in Uppsala-Näs district. Chairman of the audit committee in Uppsala City, auditor at Uppsala Ensk Läroverk and other institutions, representative of the Settlement Loan Committee in Uppsala. Deputy member of the central board of Uplands Ensk Bank, Uppsala-Ekeby AB, and other companies. Royal Order of Vasa; Swedish Ski Association. Avid skier and mountain hiker, active member of the Ski Promotion Association.

structured.name: Folke Engströmer
structured.description: Bank Director, avid skier and mountain hiker
